Name: Specstest-linux-rootfsPropagation-private
Description: Test runc  whether it supports the linux rootfsPropagation private
Explains: Test runc by set the capabilities SETFCAP to an other file

Deploys.Cmd: cd ./source/ ; go build linux_rootfsPropagation_private_host.go ; ./linux_rootfsPropagation_private_host; go build linux_rootfsPropagation_private_runcrunner.go; cp ./linux_rootfsPropagation_private_runcrunner ./../../source/linux_rootfsPropagation_private_runcrunner ; cd  ./../../source/linux_rootfsPropagation_private_runcrunner ;runc
